Sentencas: In this work, a multi-objective optimization approach is adopted for methane fueled solid oxide fuel cells in both microstructural and operational points of view.
Titulo: Multi-scale multi-objective optimization and uncertainty analysis of methane-fed solid oxide fuel cells using Monte Carlo simulations

Sentencas: The optimization procedure was performed at different stages where microstructural parameters were considered separately and also in combination with operational variables in 2-objective and 3-objective cases.
Titulo: Multi-scale multi-objective optimization and uncertainty analysis of methane-fed solid oxide fuel cells using Monte Carlo simulations

Sentencas: Effective reaction area, total conductivity and average pore radius are taken as the micro-model objective functions while system efficiency and power density as the multi-scale objectives are to be maximized.
Titulo: Multi-scale multi-objective optimization and uncertainty analysis of methane-fed solid oxide fuel cells using Monte Carlo simulations

Sentencas: Electronic phase volume fraction, porosity, fuel utilization and steam/methane ratio are some of the important design parameters.
Titulo: Multi-scale multi-objective optimization and uncertainty analysis of methane-fed solid oxide fuel cells using Monte Carlo simulations

Sentencas: The results of multi-objective problem are presented in terms of Pareto fronts of non-dominated solutions in which the compromised designs depicted among them.
Titulo: Multi-scale multi-objective optimization and uncertainty analysis of methane-fed solid oxide fuel cells using Monte Carlo simulations

Sentencas: By multi objective optimization of the microstructure of a solid oxide fuel cell anode, optimal electronic and ionic particle size of 0.4 and 0.26 mu m, electronic volume fraction of 59% and porosity of 48% are determined.
Titulo: Multi-scale multi-objective optimization and uncertainty analysis of methane-fed solid oxide fuel cells using Monte Carlo simulations

Sentencas: In addition, an optimum trade-off solution with 52% efficiency and 0.699 W/cm(2) power density is achieved by multi-scale multi-objective optimization of the system.
Titulo: Multi-scale multi-objective optimization and uncertainty analysis of methane-fed solid oxide fuel cells using Monte Carlo simulations

Sentencas: Finally, an uncertainty analysis is implemented based on Monte Carlo simulations to show the statistical performance of system outputs as well as the probability of failure of system constraints.
Titulo: Multi-scale multi-objective optimization and uncertainty analysis of methane-fed solid oxide fuel cells using Monte Carlo simulations
